description:
Your words have a huge impact on your sales.

If you use the right words that speak to your audience you can increase your sales by 300%. If you use the wrong words, you can lose people that would have been a great fit for your product or service.

.

You've probably spent many hours making sure your product or service is high quality and useful to your customers. You may have made a Udemy course, an Ebook, or your own website.

.

But when it comes to selling your product, how long did you spend writing the product description?

.

Your product description determines if your reader buys.

When a reader sees your product for the first time they have no idea how great it is. They don't know how many hours you spent working hard to create it.

.

They only know one thing: what you have chosen to communicate with them. With this in mind your words need to work extra hard because many potential customers are conditioned to believe online products are a scam.

.

You only need to learn a few Copywriting principles.

The good news is, if your goal is to increase sales of your product you don't have to learn a lot about copywriting. In fact you shouldn't. Instead it is in your best interest to learn the most important principles and nothing more.

.

These copywriting principles have been proven time and time again to deeply influence readers and persuade them to buy.

.

You can multiply your sales even if you're not a natural writer.

If you don't consider yourself to be a good writer, don't worry. Your reader doesn't care how good of a writer you are. They only care about one thing: can you solve their problem?

.

You won't be bored by useless information.

By taking this course you will get enough knowledge to remarkably increase your sales and nothing more. You already have a lot on your mind; you don't want to add any unnecessary information.

.

If you are looking to become a copywriting expert this course is not for you. For your purpose of increasing sales, learning the more advanced details of copywriting is a waste of time.

.

If you want to become a freelance copywriter this course is also not for you. This course does not include any of the technical information on how to obtain clients or create a proposal.

.

This course has one goal: increase your sales!

This course is for anyone that wants to increase his or her sales.

.

The course has one purpose: to teach you the important principles of copywriting and how to apply them to remarkably increase your sales.

That's it.

.

You can make a lot more money than you currently are.

These copywriting principles can make you a lot of money. Let's say you already sell a digital product for $49. If you can increase your sales from 2 per week to 8 per week you are making an extra $302 each week.

.

And once you learn these principles you do not forget them. You will continue to use these copywriting principles for years.

.

Copywriting is a skill that will benefit you for years.

At $99 this course is a wise investment. For many students the course will pay for itself in less than two weeks.

.

If for any reason you have second doubts about taking this course Udemy has made it very easy to get a refund.

.

You can start learning in 30 seconds.

If this course sounds like a good fit for your needs, then I encourage you to enroll right now. Click on the blue 'take this course' button in the top right hand corner.

.

It will take about 30 seconds to fill out your payment information and then you can start learning how to increase your sales, immediately.
